title: MBMBaM 464: Face 2 Face: Peace with the Ground-Children
description: We bumped the Grand Ole Opry from the Ryman lineup to present our own twisted, skewed comedy to the fine folks of Nashville, Tennessee. It was a momentous show, if only for the fact that we finally struck an accord with the Sky-Warriors, and put a climactic end to our centuries-long, unbelievably costly battle.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
